speaker: LOR SAN TEKKA
combinedline: This will begin to make things right. I've traveled too far, and seen too much, to ignore the despair in the galaxy. Without the Jedi, there can be no balance in the Force.

speaker: POE
combinedline: Well, because of you now we have a chance. The General's been after this for a long time.

speaker: LOR SAN TEKKA
combinedline: "The General." To me, she is royalty.

speaker: POE
combinedline: Well, she certainly is that.

speaker: POE
combinedline: We've got company. You have to hide.

speaker: LOR SAN TEKKA
combinedline: You have to leave. Go!

speaker: POE
combinedline: Come on, BB-8! Hurry!

speaker: POE
combinedline: I see 'em! You take this. It's safer with you than it is with me. You get as far away from here as you can. Do you hear me?

speaker: POE
combinedline: I'll come back for you! It will be all right.

speaker: TROOPER 1
combinedline: Keep moving

speaker: SENIOR TROOPER
combinedline: Stay here.

speaker: KYLO REN
combinedline: Look how old you've become.

speaker: LOR SAN TEKKA
combinedline: Something far worse has happened to you.

speaker: KYLO REN
combinedline: You know what I've come for.

speaker: LOR SAN TEKKA
combinedline: I know where you come from. Before you called yourself Kylo Ren.

speaker: KYLO REN
combinedline: The map to Skywalker. We know you've found it, and now you're going to give it to the First Order.

speaker: LOR SAN TEKKA
combinedline: The First Order rose from the dark side... you did not.

speaker: KYLO REN
combinedline: I'll show you the dark side.

speaker: LOR SAN TEKKA
combinedline: You may try, but you cannot deny the truth that is your family.

speaker: KYLO REN
combinedline: You're so right.

speaker: POE
combinedline: So who talks first? You talk first? I talk first?

speaker: KYLO REN
combinedline: The old man gave it to you.

speaker: POE
combinedline: It's just very hard to understand you with all the...

speaker: KYLO REN
combinedline: Search him.

speaker: POE
combinedline: ...Apparatus.

speaker: STORMTROOPER #1
combinedline: Nothing, sir.

speaker: KYLO REN
combinedline: Put him on board.

speaker: PHASMA
combinedline: Sir, the villagers.

speaker: KYLO REN
combinedline: Kill them all.

speaker: PHASMA
combinedline: On my command! Fire!

speaker: POE
combinedline: Please, no.

speaker: STORMTROOPER #2
combinedline: Nothing here. Go ahead!

speaker: POE
combinedline: All right. All right!

speaker: PHASMA
combinedline: FN-2187. Submit your blaster for inspection.

speaker: FINN
combinedline: Yes, Captain.

speaker: PHASMA
combinedline: And who gave you permission to remove that helmet?

speaker: FINN
combinedline: I'm sorry, Captain.

speaker: PHASMA
combinedline: Report to my division at once.

speaker: UNKAR
combinedline: What you brought me today is worth... Hmmm... One quarter portion.

speaker: REY
combinedline: Tal'ama parqual! Parqual zatana!

speaker: REY
combinedline: Noma

speaker: REY
combinedline: That's just Teedo. Wants you for parts. He has no respect for anyone.

speaker: REY
combinedline: Your antenna's bent. Where do you come from?

speaker: REY
combinedline: Classified. Really?

speaker: REY
combinedline: Me too. Big secret. Niima Outpost is that way, stay off Kelvin Ridge. Keep away from the Sinking Fields in the north, you'll drown in the sand.

speaker: REY
combinedline: Don't follow me. Town is that way.

speaker: REY
combinedline: No!

speaker: REY
combinedline: In the morning, you go.

speaker: REY
combinedline: You're welcome.

speaker: KYLO REN
combinedline: I had no idea we had the best pilot in the Resistance on board. Comfortable?

speaker: POE
combinedline: Not really.

speaker: KYLO REN
combinedline: I'm impressed. No one has been able to get out of you what you did with the map.

speaker: POE
combinedline: Might wanna rethink your technique.

speaker: KYLO REN
combinedline: Where is it?

speaker: POE
combinedline: The Resistance will not be intimidated by you.

speaker: KYLO REN
combinedline: Where... is it?

speaker: KYLO REN
combinedline: It's in a droid. A BB unit.

speaker: ARMITAGE HUX
combinedline: Well then. If it's on Jakku, we'll soon have it.

speaker: KYLO REN
combinedline: I leave that to you.

speaker: REY
combinedline: Don't give up. He still might show up. Whoever it is you're waiting for. Classified. I know all about waiting.

speaker: REY
combinedline: For my family. They'll be back. One day. Come on.

speaker: UNKAR
combinedline: These five pieces are worth... Let me see here... One half portion.

speaker: REY
combinedline: Last week they were a half portion each.

speaker: UNKAR
combinedline: What about the droid?

speaker: REY
combinedline: What about him?

speaker: UNKAR
combinedline: I'll pay for him. Sixty portions.

speaker: REY
combinedline: Actually... the droid's not for sale. Come on.

speaker: UNKAR
combinedline: Follow the girl and get that droid.

speaker: FINN
combinedline: Ren wants the prisoner.

speaker: FINN
combinedline: Turn here. Listen carefully: if you do exactly as I say, I can get you out of here.

speaker: POE
combinedline: what-?

speaker: FINN
combinedline: This is a rescue, I'm helping you escape. Can you fly a TIE fighter?

speaker: POE
combinedline: You with the Resistance--?!

speaker: FINN
combinedline: What? No no no! I'm breaking you out.

speaker: FINN
combinedline: Can you fly a TIE fighter?

speaker: POE
combinedline: I can fly anything. Why, why are you helping me?

speaker: FINN
combinedline: Because it's the right thing to do.

speaker: POE
combinedline: You need a pilot.

speaker: FINN
combinedline: I need a pilot.

speaker: POE
combinedline: We're gonna do this.

speaker: FINN
combinedline: ...Yeah?

speaker: FINN
combinedline: Okay, stay calm, stay calm.

speaker: POE
combinedline: I am calm.

speaker: FINN
combinedline: I'm talking to myself. Not yet. Okay, go. This way.

speaker: POE
combinedline: I always wanted to fly one of these things. Can ya shoot?

speaker: FINN
combinedline: Blasters, I can!

speaker: POE
combinedline: Okay, same principal! Use the toggle on the left to switch between missiles, cannons, and mag pulse -- use the site on the right to aim, triggers to fire!

speaker: FINN
combinedline: This is very complicated

speaker: POE
combinedline: I can fix this.

speaker: STAR DESTROYER TECHNICIAN
combinedline: We have an unsanctioned departure from bay two.

speaker: FIRST ORDER COLONEL
combinedline: Alert General Hux and stop that fighter.

speaker: OFFICER
combinedline: Fourteen failed

speaker: POE
combinedline: I got it! This thing really moves.

speaker: POE
combinedline: All right, we gotta take out as many cannons as we can or we're not gonna get very far!

speaker: FINN
combinedline: All right!

speaker: POE
combinedline: I'm gonna get us in position, just stay sharp! Up ahead! Up ahead! You see it? I've got us dead centered. It's a clean shot.

speaker: FINN
combinedline: Okay, got it. Yeah!

speaker: POE
combinedline: Yes!

speaker: FINN
combinedline: Did you see that?! Did you see that?

speaker: POE
combinedline: I saw it! Hey, what's your name?

speaker: POE
combinedline: Fn- whaa?

speaker: FINN
combinedline: That's the only name they ever gave me!

speaker: POE
combinedline: Well I ain't using it! Fn, huh? Finn. I'm gonna call you Finn! Is that all right?

speaker: FINN
combinedline: "Finn." Yeah, "Finn", I like that! I like that!

speaker: POE
combinedline: I'm Poe. Poe Dameron.

speaker: FINN
combinedline: Good to meet you, Poe!

speaker: POE
combinedline: Good to meet you too, Finn!

speaker: LIEUTENANT MITAKA
combinedline: Sir, they've taken out our turbolasers--

speaker: ARMITAGE HUX
combinedline: Use the ventral cannons.

speaker: LIEUTENANT MITAKA
combinedline: Yes, sir. Bringing them online --

speaker: KYLO REN
combinedline: General Hux. Is it the Resistance pilot?

speaker: ARMITAGE HUX
combinedline: Yes, and he had help. From one of our own. We're checking the registers now to identify which Stormtrooper it was.

speaker: KYLO REN
combinedline: The one from the village. FN-2187

speaker: LIEUTENANT MITAKA
combinedline: Sir. Ventral cannons hot.

speaker: ARMITAGE HUX
combinedline: Fire.

speaker: POE
combinedline: One's coming towards you. My right, your left. Do you see it?

speaker: FINN
combinedline: Hold on! I see it!

speaker: POE
combinedline: Nice shot.

speaker: FINN
combinedline: Where are you going?

speaker: POE
combinedline: We're going back to Jakku. That's where.

speaker: FINN
combinedline: No no no! We can't go back to Jakku! We need to get outta this system!

speaker: POE
combinedline: I got to get to my droid before the First Order does!

speaker: FINN
combinedline: What- a droid?!

speaker: POE
combinedline: That's right. He's a BB unit! Orange and white: one of a kind.

speaker: FINN
combinedline: I don't care what color he is! No droid can be that important!

speaker: POE
combinedline: This one is, pal.

speaker: FINN
combinedline: We need to get as far away from the First Order as we can! We go back to Jakku, we die!

speaker: POE
combinedline: That droid's got a map that leads straight to Luke Skywalker!

speaker: FINN
combinedline: Oh, you gotta be kidding me! I-

speaker: PHASMA
combinedline: Fn-2187 reported to my division, was evaluated and sent to Reconditioning.

speaker: ARMITAGE HUX
combinedline: No prior signs of non-conformity?

speaker: PHASMA
combinedline: This was his first offense.

speaker: WOMAN TECHNICIAN #1
combinedline: General. They've been hit.

speaker: ARMITAGE HUX
combinedline: Destroyed?

speaker: WOMAN TECHNICIAN #1
combinedline: Disabled. They were headed back to Jakku. The fighter is projected to crash in the Goazon Badlands

speaker: ARMITAGE HUX
combinedline: They were going back for the droid-

speaker: ARMITAGE HUX
combinedline: send a squad to the wreckage.

speaker: FINN
combinedline: Poe! Poe! Poe! Poe! I got you! Poe!!! Poe!!!

speaker: ARMITAGE HUX
combinedline: Supreme Leader Snoke was explicit. Capture the droid if we can, but destroy it if we must.

speaker: KYLO REN
combinedline: How capable are your soldiers, General?

speaker: ARMITAGE HUX
combinedline: I won't have you question my methods.

speaker: KYLO REN
combinedline: They're obviously skilled at committing high treason. Perhaps Leader Snoke should consider using a clone army.

speaker: ARMITAGE HUX
combinedline: My men are exceptionally trained- programmed from birth-

speaker: KYLO REN
combinedline: Then they should have no problem retrieving the droid. Unharmed.

speaker: ARMITAGE HUX
combinedline: Careful, Ren. That your personal interests not interfere with orders from Leader Snoke.

speaker: KYLO REN
combinedline: I want that map. For your sake, I suggest you get it.

speaker: FINN
combinedline: Water... water... Is there water..

speaker: REY
combinedline: What? Get off him!

speaker: FINN
combinedline: Hey

speaker: REY
combinedline: Who?

speaker: REY
combinedline: Him?

speaker: REY
combinedline: What's your hurry, thief?

speaker: FINN
combinedline: What-?! Thief? OW! HEY! What?!

speaker: REY
combinedline: The jacket! This droid says you stole it!

speaker: FINN
combinedline: I've had a pretty messed up day, all right?! So I'd appreciate it if you stop accusing me --!!! Stop it!

speaker: REY
combinedline: Where'd you get it? It belongs to his master.

speaker: FINN
combinedline: It belonged to Poe Dameron. That was his name, right? He was captured... by the First Order! I helped him escape but our ship crashed.

speaker: FINN
combinedline: Poe didn't make it.

speaker: FINN
combinedline: I tried to help him. I'm

speaker: FINN
combinedline: sorry...

speaker: REY
combinedline: So you're with the Resistance?

speaker: FINN
combinedline: Obviously. Yes. I am. I'm with the Resistance, yeah. I am with the Resistance.

speaker: REY
combinedline: I've never met a Resistance fighter. before.

speaker: FINN
combinedline: Well, this is what we look like. Some of us. Others look different.

speaker: REY
combinedline: BB-8 says he's on a secret mission, he has to get back to your base.

speaker: FINN
combinedline: Apparently he's carrying a map that leads to Luke Skywalker, and everyone's after it.

speaker: REY
combinedline: Luke Skywalker? I thought he was a myth.

speaker: REY
combinedline: What?

speaker: REY
combinedline: What are you doing?!

speaker: FINN
combinedline: Come on!

speaker: FINN
combinedline: Come on, BB-8!

speaker: REY
combinedline: Let go of me!

speaker: FINN
combinedline: Come on, we gotta move!

speaker: REY
combinedline: I know how to run without you holding my hand!

speaker: REY
combinedline: BB-8 stay close! This way!

speaker: STORMTROOPER
combinedline: Call in the air strike!

speaker: FINN
combinedline: Come on

speaker: REY
combinedline: They're shooting at both of us!

speaker: FINN
combinedline: Yeah, they saw you with me! You're marked!

speaker: REY
combinedline: Well, thanks for that!

speaker: FINN
combinedline: I'm not the one who chased you down with a stick!

speaker: FINN
combinedline: Does anyone have blasters around here?!

speaker: REY
combinedline: Are you okay?

speaker: REY
combinedline: Stop taking my hand! Hey!

speaker: FINN
combinedline: Are you okay?

speaker: REY
combinedline: Yeah. Follow me.

speaker: FINN
combinedline: We can't outrun them!

speaker: REY
combinedline: We might in that quad-jumper!

speaker: FINN
combinedline: Hey, We need a pilot!

speaker: REY
combinedline: We've got one!

speaker: FINN
combinedline: You?! You? What about that ship?

speaker: REY
combinedline: That one's garbage! The garbage'll do! Gunner position's down there!

speaker: FINN
combinedline: You ever fly this thing?

speaker: REY
combinedline: No! This ship hasn't flown in years!

speaker: FINN
combinedline: Great. I can do this, I can do this--

speaker: REY
combinedline: I can do this, I can do this-

speaker: UNKAR
combinedline: Hey!!!! That'S Miiiiiiine!!!

speaker: FINN
combinedline: Wait! Stay low! Stay low!

speaker: REY
combinedline: What?

speaker: FINN
combinedline: Stay low! It confuses their tracking!

speaker: REY
combinedline: BB-8, hold on!

speaker: REY
combinedline: I'm going low!!!

speaker: REY
combinedline: What are you doing back there? Are you ever gonna fire back?!

speaker: FINN
combinedline: I'm working on it! Are the shields up?

speaker: REY
combinedline: Not so easy without a co-pilot!

speaker: FINN
combinedline: Try sitting in this thing! We need cover, quick!

speaker: REY
combinedline: We're about to get some!

speaker: REY
combinedline: I hope.

speaker: FINN
combinedline: Damn it! Come on... come on...

speaker: REY
combinedline: Nice shot!

speaker: FINN
combinedline: I'm getting pretty good at this!

speaker: FINN
combinedline: The cannon's stuck in forward position, I can't move it! You gotta lose 'em!

speaker: REY
combinedline: Get ready!

speaker: FINN
combinedline: Okay! For what? Are we really doing this?!

speaker: REY
combinedline: no! Oh no!

speaker: REY
combinedline: Nice shooting!

speaker: FINN
combinedline: now that some Flying

speaker: REY
combinedline: Thanks!

speaker: FINN
combinedline: How did you do that?

speaker: REY
combinedline: I don't know

speaker: FINN
combinedline: No one trained you?

speaker: REY
combinedline: I've flown some ships but I've never left the planet

speaker: FINN
combinedline: really

speaker: REY
combinedline: Your last shot was dead on

speaker: FINN
combinedline: That was amazing!

speaker: REY
combinedline: You got him with one blast!

speaker: FINN
combinedline: You set me up for it!

speaker: REY
combinedline: It was perfect!

speaker: FINN
combinedline: That was pretty good.

speaker: REY
combinedline: You're ok. He's with the Resistance. He's going to get you home. We both will.

speaker: REY
combinedline: I don't know your name.

speaker: FINN
combinedline: Finn. What's yours.

speaker: REY
combinedline: I'm Rey.

speaker: FINN
combinedline: Rey...

speaker: REY
combinedline: Help me with this! Quick!

speaker: FINN
combinedline: Whoa! What's going on?

speaker: LIEUTENANT MITAKA
combinedline: Sir. We were unable to acquire the droid on Jakku. It escaped capture aboard a stolen Corellian YT model freighter.

speaker: KYLO REN
combinedline: The droid... stole a freighter?

speaker: LIEUTENANT MITAKA
combinedline: Not exactly, sir. It had help. We have no confirmation, but we believe FN-2187 may have been helped in the escape-

speaker: KYLO REN
combinedline: Anything else?

speaker: LIEUTENANT MITAKA
combinedline: The two were accompanied by a girl.

speaker: KYLO REN
combinedline: What girl?

speaker: REY
combinedline: It's the motivator! Grab me a Harris wrench-- check in there!

speaker: FINN
combinedline: How bad is it?!

speaker: REY
combinedline: If we wanna live, not good!

speaker: FINN
combinedline: They're hunting for us now, we gotta get outta this system!

speaker: REY
combinedline: BB-8 said the location of the Resistance Base is "need to know"- if I'm taking you there, I need to know!

speaker: FINN
combinedline: This?

speaker: FINN
combinedline: You gotta tell us where the base is.

speaker: FINN
combinedline: I don't speak that. All right, between us, I'm not with the Resistance, okay? --I'm just trying to get away from the First Order-- but you tell us where your base is, I'll get you there first-- deal?! Droid, please.

speaker: REY
combinedline: Pilex driver, hurry! So where's your base?

speaker: FINN
combinedline: Go on BB-8, tell her. Please!

speaker: REY
combinedline: The Ileenium system?

speaker: FINN
combinedline: Yeah, the Ileenium system, that's the one-- get us there as fast as you can.

speaker: REY
combinedline: I'll drop you two at Ponemah Terminal. I need the bonding tape, hurry!

speaker: FINN
combinedline: What about you?

speaker: REY
combinedline: I gotta get back to Jakku!

speaker: FINN
combinedline: Back to jak--?! Why does everyone always wanna go back to Jakku?!! That place is...

speaker: REY
combinedline: It's not that one! No. No. The one I'm pointing to! No. NO. NO. If we don't patch it up, the propulsion tank will overflow and flood the ship with poisonous gas!

speaker: FINN
combinedline: This?

speaker: REY
combinedline: Yes!

speaker: FINN
combinedline: Hey. Rey. You're a pilot-- you can fly anywhere! Why go back?! You got a family? You got a boyfriend? Cute boyfriend?

speaker: REY
combinedline: None of your business, that's why!

speaker: FINN
combinedline: ...That can't be good.

speaker: REY
combinedline: --No it can't be-- Someone's locked onto us-- all controls are overridden. Get off. Get off! See anything?

speaker: FINN
combinedline: ...Oh no. It's the First Order.

speaker: REY
combinedline: What do we do-- there must be something--

speaker: FINN
combinedline: You said poisonous gas--

speaker: REY
combinedline: --I fixed that --

speaker: FINN
combinedline: Can you unfix it?

speaker: REY
combinedline: Come on BB-8.

speaker: FINN
combinedline: I got him. I'm ok

speaker: FINN
combinedline: BB-8, get off me

speaker: REY
combinedline: Do You think this'll work on the Stormtroopers?

speaker: FINN
combinedline: Yeah. Their masks filter out smoke, not toxins. Hurry!

speaker: REY
combinedline: I'm hurrying!

speaker: HAN
combinedline: Chewie, we're home.

speaker: HAN
combinedline: Where are the others? Where's the pilot?

speaker: REY
combinedline: ...I'm the pilot...

speaker: HAN
combinedline: You?

speaker: REY
combinedline: No, it's true: we're the only ones on board.

speaker: FINN
combinedline: You can understand that thing?

speaker: HAN
combinedline: And "that thing" can understand you, too, so watch it.

speaker: HAN
combinedline: Come on out of there

speaker: HAN
combinedline: Where'd you get this ship?

speaker: REY
combinedline: Niima Outpost.

speaker: HAN
combinedline: Jakku?! That junkyard?

speaker: FINN
combinedline: Thank you! Junkyard!

speaker: HAN
combinedline: Told ya we should've double-checked the Western Reaches!

speaker: HAN
combinedline: Who had it, Ducain?

speaker: REY
combinedline: I stole it from Unkar Plutt. He stole it from the Irving Boys, who stole it from Ducain.

speaker: HAN
combinedline: Who stole it from me! Well, you tell him Han Solo just stole back the Millennium Falcon for good.

speaker: REY
combinedline: This is the Millennium Falcon? You're Han Solo?

speaker: HAN
combinedline: I used to be.

speaker: FINN
combinedline: Han Solo? The Rebellion General?

speaker: REY
combinedline: No, the smuggler!

speaker: FINN
combinedline: Wasn't he a war hero?!

speaker: REY
combinedline: This is the ship that made the Kessel Run in fourteen parsecs...!

speaker: HAN
combinedline: Twelve! Fourteen.

speaker: HAN
combinedline: Hey! Some moof-milker put a compressor on the ignition line!

speaker: REY
combinedline: Unkar Plutt did. I thought it was a mistake too, puts too much stress on the hyperdrive--

speaker: HAN
combinedline: --Stress on the hyperdrive--

speaker: HAN
combinedline: Chewie, throw 'em in a pod, we'll drop them at the nearest inhabited planet.

speaker: REY
combinedline: Wait! No-- we need your help!

speaker: HAN
combinedline: My help?

speaker: REY
combinedline: This droid has to get to the Resistance base as soon as possible!

speaker: FINN
combinedline: He's carrying a map to Luke Skywalker. You are the Han Solo that fought with the Rebellion. You knew him.

speaker: HAN
combinedline: Yeah, I knew him. I knew Luke. Don't tell me a Rathtar's gotten loose

speaker: FINN
combinedline: Wait- what?! Did you just say Rathtars? Hey! You're not hauling Rathtars on this freighter, are you?

speaker: HAN
combinedline: I'm hauling Rathtars. Oh great. It's the Guavian Death Gang- they must've tracked us from Nantoon.

speaker: REY
combinedline: What's a Rathtar?

speaker: HAN
combinedline: They're big and dangerous...

speaker: FINN
combinedline: Y'ever heard of the Trillia Massacre?!

speaker: REY
combinedline: No.

speaker: FINN
combinedline: Good.

speaker: HAN
combinedline: I got three of 'em going to King Prana.

speaker: FINN
combinedline: THREE?! How'd you get them on board?

speaker: HAN
combinedline: I used to have a bigger crew.

speaker: HAN
combinedline: Get below and stay there until I say so-- don't even think about taking the Falcon.

speaker: REY
combinedline: What about BB-8?

speaker: HAN
combinedline: He stays with me -- until I get rid of the gang, then you can have him back and be on your way.

speaker: FINN
combinedline: What about the Rathtars... where are you keeping them?

speaker: HAN
combinedline: There's one.

speaker: REY
combinedline: What are you gonna do?

speaker: HAN
combinedline: Same thing I always do: talk my way out of it.

speaker: HAN
combinedline: Yes, I do. Every time.

speaker: BALA-TIK
combinedline: Han Solo. You are a dead man.

speaker: HAN
combinedline: Bala-Tik. What's the problem?

speaker: BALA-TIK
combinedline: The problem is we loaned you fifty thousand for this job.

speaker: REY
combinedline: Can you see them?

speaker: FINN
combinedline: No.

speaker: BALA-TIK
combinedline: I heard you also borrowed fifty thousand from Kanjiklub.

speaker: HAN
combinedline: You know you can't trust those little freaks! How long've we known each other?

speaker: REY
combinedline: They have blasters...

speaker: FINN
combinedline: A lot of them.

speaker: BALA-TIK
combinedline: The question is how much longer will we know each other? Not long. We want our money back now.

speaker: HAN
combinedline: Ya think hunting Rathtars is cheap? I spent that money.

speaker: BALA-TIK
combinedline: Kanjiklub wants their investment back, too.

speaker: HAN
combinedline: I never made a deal with Kanjiklub!

speaker: BALA-TIK
combinedline: Tell that to Kanjiklub.

speaker: HAN
combinedline: Tasu Leech. Good to see you.

speaker: TASU LEECH
combinedline: Wrong again, Solo. It's over for you.

speaker: HAN
combinedline: Boys. You're both gonna get

speaker: HAN
combinedline: what I promised! Have I ever not delivered for you before?

speaker: BALA-TIK
combinedline: Yeah.

speaker: TASU LEECH
combinedline: Twice!

speaker: HAN
combinedline: What was the second time?

speaker: BALA-TIK
combinedline: Your game is old. There's no one in the galaxy left for you to swindle.

speaker: TASU LEECH
combinedline: Nowhere left for you to hide.

speaker: BALA-TIK
combinedline: That BB unit... the First Order is looking for one just like it.

speaker: BALA-TIK
combinedline: And two fugitives.

speaker: HAN
combinedline: First I've heard of it.

speaker: RAZOO QIN-FEE
combinedline: Search the freighter.

speaker: REY
combinedline: Wait wait wait wait. If we close the blast doors in that corridor, we can trap both gangs!

speaker: FINN
combinedline: Close the blast doors from here?

speaker: REY
combinedline: Resetting the fuses should do it.

speaker: HAN
combinedline: ...I got a bad feeling about this...

speaker: REY
combinedline: Oh no.

speaker: FINN
combinedline: Oh no, what?

speaker: REY
combinedline: Wrong fuses.

speaker: BALA-TIK
combinedline: Kill them! And take the droid!

speaker: FINN
combinedline: This was a mistake!

speaker: REY
combinedline: Huge! What do they look like?

speaker: FINN
combinedline: They look like that. This way!

speaker: REY
combinedline: Are you sure?

speaker: FINN
combinedline: No no no

speaker: REY
combinedline: Finn!

speaker: FINN
combinedline: Rey!

speaker: REY
combinedline: Finn!!!!

speaker: FINN
combinedline: Get off! Rey!

speaker: REY
combinedline: Finn! Finn! Finn!

speaker: FINN
combinedline: Get off me! Get off me! Get off! It had me! But the door--!

speaker: REY
combinedline: That was lucky!

speaker: HAN
combinedline: I got the door. Cover us!

speaker: HAN
combinedline: Chewie!

speaker: HAN
combinedline: You okay?

speaker: HAN
combinedline: Wow. Come on! Come on!

speaker: REY
combinedline: Han!

speaker: HAN
combinedline: You, close the door behind us!

speaker: HAN
combinedline: You take care of Chewie!

speaker: HAN
combinedline: Hey, where are you going?

speaker: REY
combinedline: Unkar Plutt installed a fuel pump too -- if we don't prime that we're not going anywhere.

speaker: HAN
combinedline: I hate that guy.

speaker: REY
combinedline: And you could use a co-pilot.

speaker: HAN
combinedline: I got one, he's back there. Watch the thrust, we're goin' out of here at lightspeed--

speaker: REY
combinedline: From inside the hangar? Is that even possible?

speaker: HAN
combinedline: I never ask that question until after I've done it.

speaker: HAN
combinedline: This is not how I thought this day was gonna go--

speaker: HAN
combinedline: angle the shields-- Hang on back there!

speaker: FINN
combinedline: No problem!

speaker: HAN
combinedline: Come on baby, don't let me down!

speaker: HAN
combinedline: What?!

speaker: REY
combinedline: Compressor.

speaker: BALA-TIK
combinedline: Inform the First Order that Han Solo has the droid they want. And it's aboard the Millennium Falcon.

speaker: SNOKE
combinedline: The droid will soon be delivered to the Resistance... ...Leading them to the last Jedi. If Skywalker returns, the new Jedi will rise.

speaker: ARMITAGE HUX
combinedline: Supreme Leader, I take full responsibility--

speaker: SNOKE
combinedline: General! Our strategy must now change.

speaker: ARMITAGE HUX
combinedline: The weapon. It is ready. I believe the time has come to use it. We shall destroy the government that supports the Resistance, the Republic. Without their friends to protect them, the Resistance will be vulnerable, and we will stop them before they reach Skywalker.

speaker: SNOKE
combinedline: Go. Oversee preparations.

speaker: ARMITAGE HUX
combinedline: Yes, Supreme Leader.

speaker: SNOKE
combinedline: There's been an awakening. Have you felt it?

speaker: KYLO REN
combinedline: Yes.

speaker: SNOKE
combinedline: There's something more. The droid we seek is aboard the Millennium Falcon. In the hands of your father, Han Solo.

speaker: KYLO REN
combinedline: He means nothing to me.

speaker: SNOKE
combinedline: Even you, master of the Knights of Ren, have never faced such a test.

speaker: KYLO REN
combinedline: By the grace of your training, I will not be seduced.

speaker: SNOKE
combinedline: We shall see. We shall see.

speaker: HAN
combinedline: Electrical overload!

speaker: REY
combinedline: I can fix that!

speaker: HAN
combinedline: The coolant's leaking!

speaker: REY
combinedline: Try transferring auxiliary power to the secondary tank--

speaker: HAN
combinedline: --Secondary tank, I got it!

speaker: FINN
combinedline: Chewie, come on!

speaker: FINN
combinedline: I need help with this gianty hairy thing!

speaker: FINN
combinedline: Stop moving!

speaker: FINN
combinedline: Chewie!

speaker: HAN
combinedline: You hurt Chewie, you're gonna deal with me!

speaker: FINN
combinedline: Hurt him?! He almost killed me six times!

speaker: FINN
combinedline: Which is fine.

speaker: HAN
combinedline: This hyperdrive blows there's gonna be pieces of us in three different systems. What'd you do?

speaker: REY
combinedline: I by-passed the compressor.

speaker: HAN
combinedline: Huh. Move, Ball.

speaker: HAN
combinedline: Nah, don't say that, you did great. Just rest.

speaker: HAN
combinedline: Good job, kid. And thanks.

speaker: FINN
combinedline: You're welcome.

speaker: HAN
combinedline: So, fugitives, huh?

speaker: REY
combinedline: The First Order wants the map. Finn is with the Resistance... ...I'm just a scavenger.

speaker: HAN
combinedline: Let's see whatcha got.

speaker: REY
combinedline: Go ahead.

speaker: HAN
combinedline: This map's not complete. It's just a piece. Ever since Luke disappeared, people have been looking for him.

speaker: REY
combinedline: Why did he leave?

speaker: HAN
combinedline: He was training a new generation of Jedi. One boy, an apprentice turned against him, destroyed it all. Luke felt responsible... He just walked away from everything.

speaker: FINN
combinedline: Do you know what happened to him?

speaker: HAN
combinedline: There're a lot of rumors. Stories. people who knew him. The best think he went looking for the first Jedi temple.

speaker: REY
combinedline: The Jedi were real?

speaker: HAN
combinedline: I used to wonder that myself. Thought it was a bunch of mumbo-jumbo -- magical power holding together good, evil, the dark side and the light. Crazy thing is, it's true. The Force, the Jedi, all of it. It's all true.

speaker: HAN
combinedline: No, you rest.

speaker: HAN
combinedline: You want my help? You're getting it. Gonna see an old friend. She'll get your droid home. This is our stop.

speaker: REY
combinedline: ...I didn't know there was this much green in the whole galaxy...

speaker: FINN
combinedline: Hey, Solo-- I'm not sure what we're walking into here--

speaker: HAN
combinedline: D'you just call me "Solo"?

speaker: FINN
combinedline: Sorry. Han-- Mr. Solo. You should know, I'm a big deal in the Resistance. Which puts a real target on my back. Are there any conspirators here? Like First Order sympathizers?

speaker: HAN
combinedline: Listen big deal, you've got another problem. Women always figure out the truth. Always.

speaker: HAN
combinedline: You might need this.

speaker: REY
combinedline: I think I can handle myself.

speaker: HAN
combinedline: I know you do. That's why I'm giving it to you. Take it. You know how to use one of these?

speaker: REY
combinedline: Yeah, you pull the trigger.

speaker: HAN
combinedline: There's a little bit more to it than that. You got a lot to learn. You got a name?

speaker: REY
combinedline: Rey.

speaker: HAN
combinedline: Rey. I've been thinkin' about bringing on some more crew, Rey. A second mate. Someone to help out. Someone who can keep up with Chewie and me, appreciates the Falcon.

speaker: REY
combinedline: Are you offering me a job?

speaker: HAN
combinedline: I wouldn't be nice to you. It doesn't pay much.

speaker: REY
combinedline: You're offering me a job.

speaker: HAN
combinedline: I'm thinking about it. Well?

speaker: REY
combinedline: If you were, I'd be flattered. But I have to get home.

speaker: HAN
combinedline: Jakku?

speaker: REY
combinedline: I've already been away too long.

speaker: HAN
combinedline: Chewie, check out the ship as best you can.

speaker: HAN
combinedline: It's too bad. Chewie kind of likes you.

speaker: FINN
combinedline: Solo, why are we here again?

speaker: HAN
combinedline: To get your droid on a clean ship.

speaker: REY
combinedline: Clean?

speaker: HAN
combinedline: Do you think it was luck that Chewie and I found the Falcon? If we can find it on our scanners, the First Order's not far behind. Want to get BB-8 to the Resistance? Maz Kanata is our best bet.

speaker: FINN
combinedline: We can trust her, right?

speaker: HAN
combinedline: Relax, kid. She's run this watering hole for a thousand years.

speaker: HAN
combinedline: Maz is a bit of an acquired taste, so let me do the talking. And whatever you do, don't stare...

speaker: REY
combinedline: At what?

speaker: FINN
combinedline: At what?

speaker: HAN
combinedline: Any of it.

speaker: MAZ
combinedline: Han Solo!

speaker: HAN
combinedline: Oh boy.

speaker: HAN
combinedline: Hey, Maz!

speaker: MAZ
combinedline: Where's my boyfriend?

speaker: HAN
combinedline: Chewie's working on the Falcon.

speaker: MAZ
combinedline: I like that Wookiee. I assume you need something. Desperately. Let's get to it.

speaker: GA-97
combinedline: Alert the Resistance. Their missing droid is here!

speaker: BAZINE
combinedline: Inform the First Order... I've found the droid.

speaker: KYLO REN
combinedline: Forgive me. I feel it again. The pull to the light. Supreme Leader senses it. Show me again, the power of the darkness, and I will let nothing stand in our way. Show me, Grandfather, and I will finish what you started.

speaker: MAZ
combinedline: A map to Skywalker himself? You're right back in the mess.

speaker: HAN
combinedline: Maz, I need you to get this droid to Leia.

speaker: MAZ
combinedline: No. You've been running away from this fight for too long. Han, nyakee nago wadda. Go home!

speaker: HAN
combinedline: Leia doesn't want to see me.

speaker: FINN
combinedline: Please, we came here for your help.

speaker: REY
combinedline: What fight?

speaker: MAZ
combinedline: The only fight: against the dark side.

speaker: MAZ
combinedline: Through the ages, I've seen evil take many forms. The Sith. The Empire. Today, it is the First Order. Their shadow is spreading across the galaxy. We must face them. Fight them. All of us.

speaker: FINN
combinedline: There is no fight against the First

speaker: FINN
combinedline: Order! Not one we can win. Look around. There's no chance we haven't been recognized already. I bet you the First Order is on their way right--

speaker: FINN
combinedline: What's this? What are you doing?

speaker: FINN
combinedline: Solo, what is she doing?

speaker: HAN
combinedline: I don't know, but it ain't good.

speaker: MAZ
combinedline: If you live long enough you see the same eyes in different people. I'm looking at the eyes of a man who wants to run.

speaker: FINN
combinedline: You don't know a thing about me. Where I'm from. What I've seen. You don't know the First Order like I do. They'll slaughter us. We all need to run.

speaker: MAZ
combinedline: You see those two? They'll trade work for transportation to the Outer Rim. There, you can disappear.

speaker: REY
combinedline: Finn?

speaker: FINN
combinedline: Come with me.

speaker: REY
combinedline: What about BB-8? We're not done yet. We have to get him back to your base.

speaker: FINN
combinedline: I can't.

speaker: HAN
combinedline: Keep it, kid.

speaker: MAZ
combinedline: Who's the girl?

speaker: FINN
combinedline: I was told you could get me to the Outer Rim.

speaker: REY
combinedline: What are you doing?

speaker: FINN
combinedline: Don't leave without me.

speaker: REY
combinedline: You can't just go. I won't let you.

speaker: FINN
combinedline: I'm not who you think I am.

speaker: REY
combinedline: Finn, what are you talking about?

speaker: FINN
combinedline: I'm not Resistance. I'm not a hero. I'm a Stormtrooper. Like all of them, I was taken from a family I'll never know. And raised to do one thing... But my first battle, I made a choice. I wasn't going to kill for them. So I ran. Right into you. And you looked at me like no one ever had. I was ashamed of what I was. But I'm done with the First Order. I'm never going back. Rey, come with me.

speaker: REY
combinedline: Don't go.

speaker: FINN
combinedline: Take care of yourself. Please.

speaker: LITTLE REY
combinedline: No! No, come back, no! No, come back! No! No! Come back!

speaker: UNKAR
combinedline: Quiet, girl!

speaker: OBI-WAN
combinedline: Rey? These are your first steps.

speaker: REY
combinedline: What was that? I shouldn't have gone in there.

speaker: MAZ
combinedline: That lightsaber was Luke's. And his father's before him and now, it calls to you!

speaker: REY
combinedline: I have to get back to Jakku.

speaker: MAZ
combinedline: Han told me. Dear child. I see your eyes. You already know the truth. Whomever you're waiting for on Jakku, they're never coming back. But... there's someone who still could.

speaker: REY
combinedline: Luke.

speaker: MAZ
combinedline: The belonging you seek is not behind you. It is ahead. I am no Jedi, but I know the Force. It moves through and surrounds every living thing. Close your eyes. Feel it. The light. It's always been there. It will guide you. The saber. Take it.

speaker: REY
combinedline: I'm never touching that thing again. I don't want any part of this.

speaker: ARMITAGE HUX
combinedline: Today is the end of the Republic! The end of a regime that acquiesces to disorder! At this very moment, in a system far from here the New Republic LIES to the GALAXY while secretly supporting the treachery of the loathsome Resistance. This fierce machine which you have built, upon which we stand, will bring an end to the Senate! To their cherished fleet! All remaining systems will bow to the First Order! And will remember this... as the last day of the Republic! Fire!

speaker: FINN
combinedline: It was the Republic. The First Order, they've done it.

speaker: FINN
combinedline: Where's Rey?

speaker: REY
combinedline: What are you doing?

speaker: REY
combinedline: You have to go back.

speaker: REY
combinedline: I'm leaving BB-8.

speaker: REY
combinedline: No, you can't-- you have to go back, you're too important. They'll help you.

speaker: MAZ
combinedline: I've had this for ages...

speaker: MAZ
combinedline: Kept it locked away.

speaker: HAN
combinedline: Where'd you get that?

speaker: MAZ
combinedline: A good question for another time.

speaker: MAZ
combinedline: Take it! Find your friend!

speaker: MAZ
combinedline: Those beasts! They're here!

speaker: STORMTROOPER
combinedline: FN-417, hold position!

speaker: REY
combinedline: Oh, Safety!

speaker: STORMTROOPER #4
combinedline: Sir, the droid was spotted heading west, with a girl.

speaker: REY
combinedline: You have to keep going, stay out of sight, I'll try to fight 'em off.

speaker: REY
combinedline: I hope so, too.

speaker: HAN
combinedline: Come on, Chewie!

speaker: MAZ
combinedline: Rey and BB-8, they need you. Now go.

speaker: FINN
combinedline: I need a weapon.

speaker: MAZ
combinedline: You have one!

speaker: HAN
combinedline: Hey, can I try that?

speaker: HAN
combinedline: I like this thing.

speaker: STORMTROOPER
combinedline: Traitor!

speaker: HAN
combinedline: You okay, Big deal?

speaker: FINN
combinedline: Thanks!

speaker: STORMTROOPER
combinedline: Don't move!

speaker: STORMTROOPER
combinedline: TK-338, we have targets in custody!

speaker: STORMTROOPER
combinedline: We have incoming at two-eight-point-six Move! Dispatch! Move! Scramble all squads! Repeat, scramble all squads! Anti-air cover en route to our position!

speaker: HAN
combinedline: It's the Resistance.

speaker: POE
combinedline: Go straight ahead at them. Don't let these dogs scare you!

speaker: JESS
combinedline: Copy that!

speaker: SNAP
combinedline: We're with you, Poe!

speaker: HAN
combinedline: Quick!

speaker: FINN
combinedline: Woo! YEAH! That's one helluva pilot!

speaker: POE
combinedline: Woohoo!

speaker: KYLO REN
combinedline: The girl I've heard so much about. The droid. Where is it?

speaker: STORMTROOPER
combinedline: Request air support!

speaker: KYLO REN
combinedline: The map. You've seen it.

speaker: STORMTROOPER #5
combinedline: Sir, Resistance fighters! We need more troops.

speaker: KYLO REN
combinedline: Pull the division out. Forget the droid. We have what we need.

speaker: STORMTROOPER
combinedline: Pull back the tree line!

speaker: FINN
combinedline: No!! No! No, no, no, no... REY!!

speaker: FINN
combinedline: He took her! Did you see that? He took her. She's gone!

speaker: HAN
combinedline: Yeah, yeah, I know...

speaker: THREEPIO
combinedline: Goodness! Han Solo! It is I, C-3PO! You probably don't recognize me because of the red arm.

speaker: THREEPIO
combinedline: Look who it is! Did you see who? Oh. Excuse me, Prin-- General.

speaker: THREEPIO
combinedline: Sorry. Come along, BB-8. Quickly.

speaker: THREEPIO
combinedline: Yes, I must get my proper arm reinstalled.

speaker: HAN
combinedline: You changed your hair.

speaker: LEIA
combinedline: Same jacket.

speaker: HAN
combinedline: No, new jacket.

speaker: HAN
combinedline: ...I saw him. Leia, I saw our son. He was here.

speaker: POE
combinedline: BB-8, my buddy! Oh it's so good to see you. Finn saved you? Where is he?

speaker: FINN
combinedline: Poe. Poe Dameron. You're alive!

speaker: POE
combinedline: Buddy! So are you!

speaker: FINN
combinedline: What happened to you?

speaker: POE
combinedline: What happened? I got thrown from the crash, I woke up at night -- no you, no ship, nothing-- BB-8 says that you saved him.

speaker: FINN
combinedline: No, no, no. It wasn't just me.

speaker: POE
combinedline: You completed my mission, Finn. That's my jacket?

speaker: FINN
combinedline: Oh...

speaker: POE
combinedline: No, no, no. Keep it. It suits you. You're a good man, Finn.

speaker: FINN
combinedline: Poe-- I need your help.

speaker: POE
combinedline: General Organa. I'm sorry to interrupt, this is Finn, he needs to talk to

speaker: LEIA
combinedline: And I need to talk to him. That was incredibly brave, what you did. Renouncing the First Order, saving this man's life--

speaker: FINN
combinedline: Thank you, ma'am-- but a friend of mine was taken prisoner--

speaker: LEIA
combinedline: Han told me about the girl, I'm sorry.

speaker: POE
combinedline: Finn's familiar with the weapon that destroyed the Hosnian system. He worked on the base.

speaker: LEIA
combinedline: We're desperate for anything you can tell us.

speaker: FINN
combinedline: That's where my friend was taken-- I've got to get there, fast.

speaker: LEIA
combinedline: And I will do everything I can to help, but first you must tell us all you know.

speaker: DR. KALONIA
combinedline: That sounds very scary.

speaker: DR. KALONIA
combinedline: You must be so brave.

speaker: THREEPIO
combinedline: General, I regret to inform you, but this map recovered from BB-8 is only partially complete. And even worse, it matches no charted system on record. We simply do not have enough information to locate Master Luke.

speaker: LEIA
combinedline: I can't believe I was so foolish to think that I could just find Luke and bring him home.

speaker: HAN
combinedline: Leia...

speaker: LEIA
combinedline: Don't do that.

speaker: HAN
combinedline: Do what?

speaker: LEIA
combinedline: Anything.

speaker: THREEPIO
combinedline: Princesses.

speaker: HAN
combinedline: I'm trying to be helpful!

speaker: LEIA
combinedline: When did that ever help? And don't say the Death Star.

speaker: THREEPIO
combinedline: BB-8. You're wasting your time.

speaker: THREEPIO
combinedline: It is very doubtful that Artoo would have the rest of the map in his backup data.

speaker: THREEPIO
combinedline: I am afraid not. R2D2 has been in low power mode ever since Master Luke went away. Sadly, he may never be his old self again.

speaker: HAN
combinedline: Listen to me, will you? I know every time you... every time you look at me, you're reminded of him.

speaker: LEIA
combinedline: You think I want to forget him? I want him back!

speaker: HAN
combinedline: There was nothing we could've done. There was too much Vader in him.

speaker: LEIA
combinedline: That's why I wanted him to train with Luke. I just never should have sent him away. That's when I lost him. That's when I lost you both.

speaker: HAN
combinedline: We both had to deal with it in our own way. I went back to the only thing I was ever good at.

speaker: LEIA
combinedline: We both did.

speaker: HAN
combinedline: We lost our son, forever.

speaker: LEIA
combinedline: No. It was Snoke. He seduced our son to the dark side. But we can still save him. Me. You.

speaker: HAN
combinedline: If Luke couldn't reach him, how could I?

speaker: LEIA
combinedline: Luke is a Jedi... you're his father. There's still light in him. I know it.

speaker: ADMIRAL STATURA
combinedline: General, the reconnaissance report on the enemy base is coming.

speaker: REY
combinedline: Where am I?

speaker: KYLO REN
combinedline: You're my guest.

speaker: REY
combinedline: Where are the others?

speaker: KYLO REN
combinedline: You mean the murderers, traitors and thieves you call friends? You'll be relieved to hear I have no idea. You still want to kill me.

speaker: REY
combinedline: That happens when you're being hunted by a creature in a mask.

speaker: KYLO REN
combinedline: Tell me about the droid.

speaker: REY
combinedline: He's a BB unit with a selenium drive and a thermal hyperscan vindicator --

speaker: KYLO REN
combinedline: carrying a section of a navigational chart. We have the rest, recovered from archives of the Empire. We need the last piece. And somehow, you convinced the droid to show it to you. You. A scavenger-- You know I can take whatever I want. ...You're so lonely... so afraid to leave... At night, desperate to sleep... you imagine an ocean. I see it-- I see the island... And Han Solo. You feel like he's the father you never had. He would've disappointed you.

speaker: REY
combinedline: --Get out of my head--

speaker: KYLO REN
combinedline: I know you've seen the map. It's in there... and now you'll give it to me. Don't be afraid. I feel it too.

speaker: REY
combinedline: I'm not giving you anything.

speaker: KYLO REN
combinedline: We'll see.

speaker: REY
combinedline: You... you're afraid... that you will never be as strong as... Darth Vader!

speaker: SNOKE
combinedline: This scavenger, resisted you?

speaker: KYLO REN
combinedline: She's strong with the Force, untrained but, stronger than she knows.

speaker: SNOKE
combinedline: And the droid?

speaker: ARMITAGE HUX
combinedline: Ren believed it was no longer valuable to us. That the girl was all we needed. As a result, the droid has most likely been returned to the hands of the enemy. They may have the map already.

speaker: SNOKE
combinedline: Then the Resistance must be destroyed before they get to Skywalker.

speaker: ARMITAGE HUX
combinedline: We have their location. We tracked their reconnaissance ship to the Ileenium system.

speaker: SNOKE
combinedline: Good. Then we will crush them once and for all. Prepare the weapon.

speaker: KYLO REN
combinedline: Supreme Leader. I can get the map from the girl. I just need your guidance.

speaker: SNOKE
combinedline: If what you say about this girl is true, bring her to me.

speaker: REY
combinedline: You will remove these restraints. And leave this cell, with the door open.

speaker: TROOPER GUARD #2
combinedline: What did you say?

speaker: REY
combinedline: You will remove these restraints. And leave this cell, with the door open.

speaker: TROOPER GUARD #2
combinedline: I'll tighten those restraints, scavenger scum!

speaker: REY
combinedline: You will remove these restraints. And leave this cell, with the door open.

speaker: TROOPER GUARD #2
combinedline: I will remove these restraints. And leave this cell, with the door open.

speaker: REY
combinedline: And you will drop your weapon.

speaker: TROOPER GUARD #2
combinedline: And I'll drop my weapon.

speaker: KYLO REN
combinedline: No. No! GUARDS! GUARDS!

speaker: ARMITAGE HUX
combinedline: Begin charging the weapon!

speaker: STARKILLER TECHNICIAN
combinedline: Yes, sir. Weapon charging.

speaker: POE
combinedline: The scan data from Snap's reconnaissance flight confirms Finn's report.

speaker: SNAP
combinedline: They've somehow created a hyper lightspeed weapon built within the planet itself.

speaker: BRANCE
combinedline: A laser cannon?

speaker: SNAP
combinedline: We're not sure how to describe a weapon of this scale.

speaker: MAJOR EMATT
combinedline: It's another Death Star.

speaker: POE
combinedline: I wish that were the case, Major. This was the Death Star. And this is Starkiller Base.

speaker: HAN
combinedline: So it's big.

speaker: ADMIRAL ACKBAR
combinedline: How is it possible to power a weapon of that size?

speaker: FINN
combinedline: It uses the power of the sun. As the weapon is charged, the sun is drained until it disappears.

speaker: LEIA
combinedline: The First Order: they're charging the weapon again, now. Our system is the next target.

speaker: THREEPIO
combinedline: Oh my. Without the Republic fleet, we're doomed.

speaker: HAN
combinedline: Okay, how do we blow it up? There's always a way to do that.

speaker: LEIA
combinedline: Han's right.

speaker: ADMIRAL STATURA
combinedline: In order for that amount of power to be contained, that base has to have some kind of thermal oscillator...

speaker: FINN
combinedline: There is one. Precinct 47. Here. If we can destroy that oscillator, it might de-stabilize the core and cripple the weapon.

speaker: MAJOR EMATT
combinedline: ...Maybe the planet.

speaker: POE
combinedline: We'll go in there and we'll hit that oscillator with everything we got.

speaker: ADMIRAL ACKBAR
combinedline: They have defensive shields that our ships cannot penetrate.

speaker: HAN
combinedline: We disable the shields.

speaker: HAN
combinedline: Kid, you worked there, what do you got?

speaker: FINN
combinedline: I can do it.

speaker: HAN
combinedline: I like this guy.

speaker: FINN
combinedline: I can disable the shields. But I have to be there, on the planet--

speaker: HAN
combinedline: We'll get you there.

speaker: LEIA
combinedline: Han, how?

speaker: HAN
combinedline: If I told you, you wouldn't like it.

speaker: POE
combinedline: So we disable the shields, take out the oscillator and we blow up their big gun.

speaker: POE
combinedline: All right. Let's go!

speaker: HAN
combinedline: Chewie, check that donal capitator.

speaker: HAN
combinedline: Come on. Let's go.-- Finn, be careful with those- they're explosives.

speaker: FINN
combinedline: Now you tell me?

speaker: LEIA
combinedline: No matter how much we fought, I've always hated watching you leave.

speaker: HAN
combinedline: That's why I did it. So you'd miss me.

speaker: LEIA
combinedline: I did miss you.

speaker: HAN
combinedline: It wasn't all bad, was it? Huh? Some of it was...good.

speaker: LEIA
combinedline: ...Pretty good.

speaker: HAN
combinedline: Some things never change.

speaker: LEIA
combinedline: True. You still drive me crazy. If you see our son again, bring him home.

speaker: STORMTROOPER
combinedline: Sir, sensors triggered in hangar 718. We're searching the area.

speaker: KYLO REN
combinedline: She's just beginning to test her powers. The longer it takes to find her, the more dangerous she becomes.

speaker: FINN
combinedline: How are we getting in?

speaker: HAN
combinedline: Their shields have a fractional refresh rate. Keeps anything traveling slower than lightspeed from getting through.

speaker: FINN
combinedline: We're gonna make our landing approach at lightspeed?!

speaker: HAN
combinedline: Chewie, get ready. And Now!

speaker: HAN
combinedline: I am pulling up!

speaker: HAN
combinedline: I get any higher, they'll see us!

speaker: OFFICER
combinedline: Sir, she was not found in hangar 718 but all troops are on alert.

speaker: KYLO REN
combinedline: Put every hangar on lock-down. She's going to try to steal a ship to-- Han Solo...

speaker: FINN
combinedline: The flooding tunnels are over that ridge. We'll get in that way.

speaker: HAN
combinedline: What was your job when you were based here?

speaker: FINN
combinedline: Sanitation.

speaker: HAN
combinedline: Sanitation?

speaker: HAN
combinedline: Then how do you know how to disable the shields?

speaker: FINN
combinedline: I don't. I'm just here to get Rey.

speaker: HAN
combinedline: People are counting on us! The galaxy is counting on us--!

speaker: FINN
combinedline: Solo, we'll figure it out! We'll use the Force!

speaker: HAN
combinedline: That's not how the Force works--!

speaker: HAN
combinedline: Oh really, you're cold?

speaker: FINN
combinedline: Come on!

speaker: ARMITAGE HUX
combinedline: Report.

speaker: FIRST ORDER OFFICER
combinedline: Weapon charged in fifteen minutes, sir.

speaker: STORMTROOPER FN-9330
combinedline: Hey!

speaker: HAN
combinedline: The longer we're here, less luck we're going to have. The shields?

speaker: FINN
combinedline: I have an idea about that.

speaker: FINN
combinedline: Remember me?

speaker: FINN
combinedline: Not anymore. The name's Finn, and I'm in charge. I'm in charge now, Phasma. I'm in charge.

speaker: HAN
combinedline: Bring it down. Bring it down.

speaker: FINN
combinedline: Follow me.

speaker: FINN
combinedline: You want me to blast that bucket off your head? Lower the shields.

speaker: PHASMA
combinedline: You're making a big mistake.

speaker: FINN
combinedline: Do it.

speaker: FINN
combinedline: Solo, if this works, we're not going to have a lot of time to find Rey.

speaker: HAN
combinedline: Don't worry kid, we won't leave here without her.

speaker: PHASMA
combinedline: You can't be so stupid as to think this will be easy. My troops will storm this block and kill you all.

speaker: FINN
combinedline: I disagree.

speaker: FINN
combinedline: What do we do with her?

speaker: HAN
combinedline: Is there a garbage chute? Trash compactor?

speaker: FINN
combinedline: Yeah, there is...

speaker: OFFICER
combinedline: General, their shields are down!

speaker: THREEPIO
combinedline: Thank the Maker!

speaker: LEIA
combinedline: Han did it! Send them in!

speaker: ADMIRAL STATURA
combinedline: Give Poe full authorization to attack.

speaker: GULCH
combinedline: Black Leader, go to sub-lights. On your call.

speaker: POE
combinedline: Roger, base-- red squad, blue squad, take my lead.

speaker: SNAP
combinedline: Dropping out of lightspeed.

speaker: POE
combinedline: Almost in range! Hit the target dead center, as many runs as we can get!

speaker: SNAP
combinedline: Approaching target.

speaker: ARMITAGE HUX
combinedline: Dispatch all squadrons...

speaker: COLONEL DATOO
combinedline: Yes, General.

speaker: POE
combinedline: All right, let's light it up!

speaker: LT. BASTIAN
combinedline: Direct hit!

speaker: ELLO ASTY
combinedline: But no damage!

speaker: POE
combinedline: Yeah, we gotta keep hitting it! Another bombing run! Remember, when the sun is gone, that weapon will be ready to fire! But as long as there's light, we got a chance.

speaker: POE
combinedline: Guys, we got a lot of company!

speaker: FINN
combinedline: We'll use the charges to blow that blast door. I'll go in and draw fire, but I'm gonna need cover.

speaker: HAN
combinedline: You sure you're up for this?

speaker: FINN
combinedline: Hell no-- I'll go in find and try to find Rey-- --The troopers'll be on our tail. We have to be ready for that. There's an access tunnel that'll leads-- Why are you doing that? Why are you doing-- this? I'm trying to come up with a plan.

speaker: HAN
combinedline: You all right?

speaker: REY
combinedline: Yeah.

speaker: HAN
combinedline: Good.

speaker: FINN
combinedline: What happened-- did he hurt you?

speaker: REY
combinedline: Finn. What are you doing here?!

speaker: FINN
combinedline: We came back for you.

speaker: FINN
combinedline: What'd he say?

speaker: REY
combinedline: ...That it was your idea. Thank you.

speaker: FINN
combinedline: How did you get away?

speaker: REY
combinedline: I can't explain it. And you wouldn't believe it.

speaker: HAN
combinedline: Escape now. Hug later.

speaker: SNAP
combinedline: I got one behind me. You see it?

speaker: JESS
combinedline: Yeah, I'm on it! Burillo's been hit!

speaker: SNAP
combinedline: Watch out for ground fire!

speaker: HAN
combinedline: They're in trouble. We can't leave. My friend's got a bag full of explosives. Let's use 'em.

speaker: KAYDEL KO CONNIX
combinedline: General, are you seeing this?

speaker: VOBER DAND
combinedline: Two more X-wings down. That's half our fleet destroyed.

speaker: THREEPIO
combinedline: And their weapon will be fully charged in 10 minutes! It would take a miracle to save us now.

speaker: HAN
combinedline: Girl knows her stuff.

speaker: HAN
combinedline: We'll set the charges at every other column.

speaker: HAN
combinedline: You're right. That's a better idea. You take the top. I'll go down below. Detonator.

speaker: HAN
combinedline: We'll meet back here.

speaker: KYLO REN
combinedline: Find them.

speaker: HAN
combinedline: Ben!

speaker: KYLO REN
combinedline: Han Solo. I've been waiting for this day for a long time.

speaker: HAN
combinedline: Take off that mask. You don't need it.

speaker: KYLO REN
combinedline: What do you think you'll see if I do?

speaker: HAN
combinedline: The face of my son.

speaker: KYLO REN
combinedline: Your son is gone. He was weak and foolish, like his father. So I destroyed him.

speaker: HAN
combinedline: That's what Snoke wants you to believe but it's not true. My son is alive.

speaker: KYLO REN
combinedline: No. The Supreme Leader is wise.

speaker: HAN
combinedline: Snoke is using you for your power. When he gets what he wants, he'll crush you-- you know it's true.

speaker: KYLO REN
combinedline: It's too late.

speaker: HAN
combinedline: No it's not. Leave here with me. Come home. We miss you.

speaker: KYLO REN
combinedline: I'm being torn apart. I want to be free of this pain. I know what I have to do, but I don't know if I have the strength to do it. Will you help me?

speaker: HAN
combinedline: Yes. Anything.

speaker: REY
combinedline: No!

speaker: KYLO REN
combinedline: Thank you.

speaker: REY
combinedline: No, no

speaker: ADMIRAL ACKBAR
combinedline: The Oscillator's been damaged but is still functional.

speaker: OFFICER TABALA ZO
combinedline: Admiral, their weapon will fire in two minutes.

speaker: FINN
combinedline: The Falcon's this way.

speaker: KYLO REN
combinedline: We're not done yet.

speaker: REY
combinedline: You're a monster!

speaker: KYLO REN
combinedline: It's just us now. Han Solo can't save you.

speaker: FINN
combinedline: Rey!

speaker: FINN
combinedline: Rey! Rey... Rey... Oh no. Oh

speaker: FINN
combinedline: no no... rey

speaker: KYLO REN
combinedline: Traitor!

speaker: KYLO REN
combinedline: That lightsaber. It belongs to me!

speaker: FINN
combinedline: Come get it.

speaker: NIV LEK
combinedline: We just lost R-1!

speaker: JESS
combinedline: We're overwhelmed! What do we do? It isn't working!

speaker: YOLO ZIFF
combinedline: Black Leader, there's a brand new hole in that oscillator. Looks like our friends got in!

speaker: POE
combinedline: Red Four! Red Six! Cover us!

speaker: LT. BASTIAN
combinedline: I'm on it!

speaker: ELLO ASTY
combinedline: Roger!

speaker: POE
combinedline: Everybody else, hit the target hard! Give it everything you got! I need some help here! I need some help!

speaker: LT. BASTIAN
combinedline: I'm coming in!

speaker: JESS
combinedline: Watch out!

speaker: ELLO ASTY
combinedline: I'm hit!

speaker: POE
combinedline: All teams- I'm going in! Pull up and cover me!

speaker: NIV LEK
combinedline: Copy that, Black Leader! Good luck, Poe!

speaker: STARKILLER TECHNICIAN
combinedline: Weapon fully charged in thirty seconds.

speaker: ARMITAGE HUX
combinedline: Prepare to fire.

speaker: KYLO REN
combinedline: You need a teacher! I can show you the ways of the Force!

speaker: REY
combinedline: The Force?

speaker: COLONEL DATOO
combinedline: Lieutenant, get back to your station!

speaker: YOUNG TECHNICIAN
combinedline: Just look. We won't survive -- even Hux has gone!

speaker: ARMITAGE HUX
combinedline: Supreme Leader. The fuel cells have ruptured. The collapse of the planet has begun.

speaker: SNOKE
combinedline: Leave the base at once and come to me with Kylo Ren. It is time to complete his training.

speaker: REY
combinedline: Finn!

speaker: POE
combinedline: All teams! I got eyes on them!

speaker: SNAP
combinedline: Yes!

speaker: POE
combinedline: Our job's done here. Let's go home!

speaker: MEDIC
combinedline: Easy, easy. He's hurt. We've got a heartbeat.

speaker: THREEPIO
combinedline: R2D2! You've come back! You found what?

speaker: THREEPIO
combinedline: How dare you call me that!

speaker: THREEPIO
combinedline: Find Master Luke how?

speaker: THREEPIO
combinedline: Come, R2! We must go tell the others at once!

speaker: THREEPIO
combinedline: General? Excuse me, General?

speaker: THREEPIO
combinedline: R2D2 may contain some much needed good news.

speaker: LEIA
combinedline: Tell me.

speaker: POE
combinedline: Yeah, all right, buddy, hold on--

speaker: THREEPIO
combinedline: Oh! The map! It is complete!

speaker: LEIA
combinedline: Luke!

speaker: THREEPIO
combinedline: Oh my dear friend. How I've missed you.

speaker: REY
combinedline: We'll see each other again. I believe that. Thank you, my friend.

speaker: LEIA
combinedline: Rey. May the Force be with you.
